remarks: The null space of a continuous linear functional is a closed subspace. Remark 3.8 of [Beran] p. 103.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 19-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

nlelch.1 $e |- T e. LinFn $.
